name: The Epic Quest for the Kings Crown Jewels
name_original: The Epic Quest for the Kings Crown Jewels
description:
The Epic Quest for the Kings Crown Jewels

Fight stone golems with the knight und ghosts with the mage

Controls Keyboard / Mouse WASD Movement Space Jump Mouse Left Attack Q / E Swap Character Gamepad (Xbox Buttons) Left Stick Movement A Jump X Attack Left Shoulder / Right Shoulder Swap Character Credits

Alena Keln: 2D Art
Benjamin Reichstein: Sounds & Music
Christina Rauscher: Music & 2D Art
Dominik Nickl: Coding
Jim Garrett: Projekt Lead
Luca Gräf: Azubi
